Protocol of database changes on 28_06_11_oracle on alibaba
----------------------------------------------------------


Relevant for update:
* executed DB update of prototypical implementation
  (label + operation für "Stücklistenausleitung aus Komponentenstruktur")
  - label changed to "Stücklistenausleitung"
  - 
* meldungen 4300-4399
* class cad_variant
* beschriftungen, neu: ID="variants"
* beschriftungen, "cdbwsm_createbom" changed
* Maske variant
* class bom_item_occurrence
* relationship bom_item_to_occurrences
* beschriftungen, neu: ID="occurrences"
* Tabellen der neuen Klassen

* relationship document->variant  "document_to_variants"
* rule BOM: Ignore Component Document
* rule BOM: Ignore Component Item
* rule BOM: Recursive Ignore Component
* "ausgaben" (Beschriftungen) "WSM_BOM_*"
* new class bom_method
   - 5 instances of that class
     cdb.wsmcomponents.ComponentStructureBOMReader
     cdb.wsmcomponents.CADBomInfoReader  CHANGED the name
     cdb.wsmcomponents.RecursiveBOMReader
     cdb.wsmcomponents.TakeReaderFromDocument
     cdb.wsmcomponents.CADBomInfoReaderWithReferences  ADDED

* new class bom_config
* new class bom_key_attribute
* new class bom_sync_attribute
* bom_mapping
* bom_column
* ausgaben: bom_config_key_attributes, bom_config_sync_attributes, bom_config_columns, bom_config_appinfo_mappings
* new browser "bom_config_method
* all relationships starting from bom_config
* Browsers (Kataloge) bom_config_method and model_bom_method
* class bom_config_to_role  (used for a 1:N relationship)
* bom_config_to_role_dtag
* cdb_menu_tree, cdb_object_id=815932ee-b6b4-11e0-9533-6cf049769241   ("Stücklistenausleitung")


* Browser bom_select_display_attributes
* Strukturdarstellung bom_select_display_attributes  (class cdb_struct_def_mask)  (used by new browser)
* relationship bom_select_display_attributes_rel2  (used by Strukturdarstellung)
* relationship bom_select_display_attributes_rel1


* new attribute "bom_method" of existing class "document"

* Two new fields of the model mask: (These SHOULD BE INVISIBLE when the exp file is created):
* new "Maskenelement" (relation "masken") name="zeich_mask", attribut="bom_method"
* new "Maskenelement" (relation "masken") name="zeich_mask_c", attribut="bom_method"

* new instances of "cdb_help"    (maybe automatically done when masks are exported??)
   -  cdb_mask_bom_config_reg
   -  cdb_mask_bom_column
   -  cdb_mask_bom_key_attribute
   -  cdb_mask_bom_sync_attribute
   -  cdb_mask_bom_mapping
   -  cdb_mask_bom_method
